snippet: A woman with Alzheimer’s was sexually assaulted by other residents at the Bella Vista Health Center, a nursing home in Lemon Grove, Calif., according to an investigation by the state’s department of public health.
lead_paragraph: A woman with Alzheimer’s was sexually assaulted by other residents at the Bella Vista Health Center, a nursing home in Lemon Grove, Calif., according to an investigation by the state’s department of public health.

headline.main: Report on Bella Vista Health Center
